cards.title: Light
cards.description: "Light" spell: Touch object <10ft, sheds bright light 20ft, dim light 20ft, customizable color. Blocked by opaque cover. Ends on recast/dismissal. Hostile target: Dex save or light.

art_versions.prompt: High-fantasy illustration of the spell **Light**. Painterly, ArtStation / Wizards-of-the-Coast style. Dramatic, cinematic lighting; rich, detailed environment. Depict a **gnome warlock** in mid-cast. Visualise the core effect: "Light" spell: Touch object <10ft, sheds bright light 20ft, dim light 20ft, customizable color.. Sharp focus, dynamic composition, aspect 3:4.
